events.message: I just received my order but the laptop screen is cracked and has several scratches, which makes it unusable.
The issue was categorized as a Product Defect based on the description of damage and scratches on the received laptop.
A customer service agent specializing in product defects was assigned to handle this case for proper follow-up.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked screen on your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged laptop so we can assess the defect and proceed with the next steps?
I have attached several photos showing the cracked screen and scratches on the laptop surface as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement laptop, as I still want to use the product for work as soon as possible.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive a confirmation email shortly including the shipping details.
Just following up to confirm that you received the replacement laptop and that it is in good condition now.
Yes, I received the replacement laptop yesterday and it looks perfect. Thank you for your quick support!
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now, and please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
